ComicInfo.Penciller: Brian Ching,David Boller,Ken Lashley,Brian Ching,David Boller,Ken Lashley
ComicInfo.Summary: Rowina teaches Marcus how to exercise mental power over his enemies but Petra finds a way to utilize the visions to her advantage. In the meantime, Petra, Lucien and Andromeda have worked a deal with Commander Salvati which allows Andromeda to seek answers in pursuing her genetic research in a federal hidden laboratory.
